author: paras25619@gmail.com
name: agno-assist-agent
description: AI-powered documentation assistant for the Agno framework using retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). Provides accurate, documentation-grounded responses by searching vector databases with hybrid search capabilities.

environment_variables.description: OpenRouter API key for LLM calls (required)
Mem0 API key for conversation memory (required)
Enable LanceDB vector database for documentation (default: true)
